content: विप्लवः {@--1@} Floating or drifting about, floating in different directions. {@--2@} Opposition, contrariety. {@--3@} Confusion, perplexity. {@--4@} Tumult, scuffle, affray; <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Devastation, predatory warfare; danger from an enemy. {@--6@} Extortion. {@--7@} Loss, destruction; सत्त्वविप्लवात् <ls>R. 8. 41.</ls> {@--8@} Adverseness, evil turn; अथवा मम भाग्यविप्लवात् <ls>R. 8. 47.</ls> {@--9@} The rust on a mirror (dust accumulating on its surface); अपवर्जितविप्लवे शुचौ… मतिरादर्श इवाभिदृश्यते <ls>Ki. 2. 26</ls> (where विप्लव also means प्रमाणबाधः ‘absence of reasoning’). {@--10@} Transgression, violation; <ls>Ki. 1. 13.</ls> {@--11@} An evil, a calamity. {@--12@} Sin, wickedness, sinfulness. {@--13@} Terrifying an enemy by shouts and gestures. {@--14@} Divulging, making public.
